languages.text: {n}Абеляр победно взирает на притихших дворян и — с гордостью — на правнучку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр победно взирает на притихших дворян и — с гордостью — на правнучку.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard surveys the quiet nobles with triumph, and then looks at his great-granddaughter with pride.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр победно взирает на притихших дворян и — с гордостью — на правнучку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard is looking triumphantly at the quiet nobles and — with pride — at his great-granddaughter.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは静かになった貴族たちを勝利の目で見渡すと、誇らしげにひ孫を見つめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard surveys the quiet nobles with triumph, and then looks at his great-granddaughter with pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは静かになった貴族たちを勝利の目で見渡すと、誇らしげにひ孫を見つめる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德带着胜利的表情，打量着噤若寒蝉的贵族们，随后骄傲地看着自己的曾孙女。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard surveys the quiet nobles with triumph, and then looks at his great-granddaughter with pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德带着胜利的表情，打量着噤若寒蝉的贵族们，随后骄傲地看着自己的曾孙女。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard observa a los nobles silenciosos con gesto triunfal y a su bisnieta con orgullo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard surveys the quiet nobles with triumph, and then looks at his great-granddaughter with pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard observa a los nobles silenciosos con gesto triunfal y a su bisnieta con orgullo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abélard promène un regard triomphateur sur l'assemblée de nobles avant de se tourner vers son arrière-petite-fille, débordant de fierté.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard beobachtet triumphierend die verstummten Adligen und mustert dann voller Stolz seine Urenkelin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard, sessizliğe bürünmüş soyluları muzaffer bir havayla seyrettikten sonra, torununun kızına gururla bakıyor.{/n}
